thread.section_title: MirrorMate Frames Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MirrorMate Frames | mirrormate.com | 3 of 100
thread.title: JQ

author: JQ
title: JQ
text: I highly recommend this company and product. I look forward to framing another mirror. I made a mistake measuring my mirror due to not square walls/ceiling - the frame needed to be trimmed. Customer service representative Kim provided exemplary service. I returned the items in question at no charge to me, had the items trimmed to size and then shipped back to me for a nominal shipping charge. Following the simple hanging directions provided me with a beautiful finished product. A small change with a huge positive effect!
